amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in part C of House Report 111-143 to express the sense of Congress that the United States should continue working with the states of the former Soviet Union to see that emigres from these states who now live in the United States are paid the pensions they are owed by these states.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler (NY) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
